媱字的基本解释

媱
yáo
曲肩行的样子。
嬉戏，玩乐。
美好。

媱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yáo］
［《廣韻》餘昭切，平宵，以。］
(1)逍遥游乐。
(2)艳美。
(3)见“要媱”。

媱字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　媱； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页267第39
【廣韻】【集韻】?餘招切，音瑤。【說文】曲肩行貌。一曰戲也，美好也。　又山名。姑媱山，在帝臺東。帝女死，化爲䔄草，服之媚于人。見【山海經】。

逍遥游乐；艳美。

媱
Basic explanation of words
媱
yáo
The appearance of bending shoulders.
Play and have fun.
Beautiful.
媱
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yáo］
["Guangyun" Yu Zhaoqie, Ping Xiao, to. ]
(1) Happy fun.
(2) Gorgeous and beautiful.
(3) See "Yao Nai".
媱
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　媱; Kangxi strokes: 13; Page number: page 267 39
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Yu Zhaoqie, Yin Yao. [Said the text] The appearance of curved shoulders. One said that the drama is also beautiful.　Also the name of the mountain. Guzhen Mountain is in Taitung. When the emperor died, she turned into grass, and she was charming to others. See [Shan Hai Jing].
媱
